redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Users should log into Bungie.net with their preferred platform and access this page to input the code: https://www.bungie.net/7/en/codes/redeem
Once redeemed on their account, they can obtain it in-game via the Special Deliveries Kiosk in the Tower, or in Collections under the â€œFlairâ€ section.

How to redeem:
Visit the code redemption page on the official website of Honkai: Star Rail (https://hsr.hoyoverse.com/gift). Log in to your game account and follow the instructions to input the code. Once redeemed, you will receive the Bundle through the in-game mail system.

Redemption Code Content: Stellar Jade Ã—30*, Credit Ã—20,000, Lost Gold Fragment Ã—4, Condensed Aether Ã—5, Traveler's Guide Ã—3.

* Rewards are limited to 750,000 and will be available exclusively to the first 750,000 Trailblazers who successfully complete the Quest. The distribution of rewards will be based on when the codes were redeemed after completing the task, and they will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis.

* The redemption code will expire on 2025/12/3 11:00:00 (UTC+8). We highly recommend redeeming it as soon as possible.

To redeem your ARC Raiders launch Quest gift code, visit Embark's code redemption website and log in to your account: https://id.embark.games/id/arc-raiders/giveaway  
Paste your gift code to obtain your Hiker Backpack - Sky Ice. 

**Requires ARC Raiders; redeem by 9th November 2025.**

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
To redeem an offer code on the web:  
1. Visit this website: https://store.pokemongo.com/offer-redemption  
2. Log in using the same credentials you use to access your PokÃ©mon GO account.  
3. Enter your offer code.  
4. After successfully redeeming an offer code, a message will display the items added to your inventory.  

**The redemption code will expire on November 16, 2025, at 08:00 AM UTC (12:00 AM PST). We highly recommend redeeming it as soon as possible.**

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
How to claim your mining ship:

1. Register or log in to your [EVE Online account](https://www.eveonline.com/now/eve-online-catalyst?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=cpm&utm_campaign=cn:ww_lg:en_mg:1_pd:1_cd:video-quest_cs:general_ct:instruction_tg:homepage_br:eve).  
2. Visit the code [activation page](https://secure.eveonline.com/code-activation?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=cpm&utm_campaign=cn:ww_lg:en_mg:1_pd:1_cd:video-quest_cs:general_ct:instruction_tg:homepage_br:eve).  
3. Enter your Quest code.  
4. Log into EVE Online and claim your ship from the redemption queue. You can access the queue by clicking the disc icon at the bottom left of your screen.  
 
If you're creating a new account, complete the signup process firstâ€”then return to the code activation page once your account is set up.

messages.video_end_cta_subtitle: Jump into a new mining expansion for EVE Online

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Redeem the code in-game by navigating to [Store>Items>Add Bonus/Gift Code] at the bottom left corner. 
Voucher code can be used once per account. 
Valid Platforms: STEAM, EPIC, and KAKAO
